Detailed Description

NAME

WeBWorK::Cookie - inherit from either Apache::Cookie or Apache2::Cookie depending on mod_perl version.

SYNOPSIS

Given 

$r

, a WeBWorK::Request object 

 my $cookie = new WeBWorK::Cookie
